doc.name: DocViewerFactory
doc.description: An attribute that creates an editor to open a doc viewer for its container's container. The usage for this is to put it in a visible attribute. When the user double clicks on the visible attribute or selects Configure from the context menu, this class will open documentation for the container's container. If the container's container doesn't have any documentation, then the user sees a dialog with instructions on how to create the documentation.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
